DOC.brief_summary: A single center prospective , randomize , control split face study compare 532nm KTP laser 595nm PDL treatment Erythematotelangiectatic Rosacea Papulopustular Rosacea . Subjects receive 3 laser treatment 4 week apart follow 4 6 week post-final laser treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Excel V 532 nm KTP Laser Treatment Erythematotelangiectatic Rosacea & Papulopustular Rosacea
